org.metavrp.algorithm.GA

Class GeneList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metavrp.algorithm.GA.GeneList

  • public class GeneList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has all the genes that are needed. Every chromosome is made from this list and not directly from the genes. This has the benefit that at the beginning of the run of the program, we create all possible genes and use pointers to them all over the run time. This saves time and space, and we can compare genes by hashvalue and not by it's state (by the values of his variables).
